WorkItem.Summary: Make it possible to shift selected range(cells) or entire row and column either vertically or horizontally

Comments.Message: It also has to account formula commutation.

>> It also has to account formula commutation.
There's already methods in the PHPExcel_ReferenceHelper class for adjusting formulae.
You can see it being called if you look at the code for the insertNewRowBefore() and insertNewColumnBefore() methods or the removeRow() and removeColumn() methods in the PHPExcel_Worksheet class.
